entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
